🚀 fl0ck.biz 🚀

Stay up-to-date with the latest market movements!

Your one-stop destination for all things market news and trading

Using Python, Django, Docker, f.m.p. api, and TradingView I created a website

⚠️ Future updates include PyTorch capability and on site back testing ⚠️



📈 Stock Market Screener 📉

Used Python, iexfinace api, pandas, beautiful soup4 and f.m.p. api

The screener then grabs the markets top gainers, losers and most active of the day

Using the list it returns a confidence score after assessing multiple (personal) T.I. tests

👉 THIS IS NOT FINANCIAL ADVICE 👈


💠 CSCI 420 Quantum Computing 💠

Using Qiskit, ran quantum circuits through IBM’s Quantum Computer

Traced quantum circuits using matrices and Tensor products

Implemented Phase kickback; can denote states using Dirac notation



🌳 Dijkstra & Kruskal's Algorithmn 🌳

Used C++ structs, vectors, vector of vectors, pointers and priority queues

Implemented both algorithms to find print MST(With weight if present)

Found shortest path from source vertex to other vertices in a graph



🧬 Suffix Array By Induced Sorting (SAIS) 🧬

Used C++ vectors

Created and sorted suffix arrays recursively in linear time
